The navX-Micro Github repository is at https://github.com/kauailabs/navxmxp.

This repository includes:

- navX-Micro firmware source code (C, C++) and project files for Eclipse
- navX-Micro hardware schematics/layout files (Eagle PCB 6.5 format)
- navXTools source code (C#)
- navXUI source code (Processing)
- navX-Micro Setup Program (Innosetup)

For more information please also see the online guide to the sources in the "Advanced" section at http://navx-micro.kauailabs.com.
